name: Barrier (Toyrim)
description:
No matter, how high you go, new berriers will not stop appearing on your way, and this is not a philosophy, it is about a game - Barrier.

You play as a little square named Jem, you need to dodge falling barriers, climbing higher and higher in the sky to raise your record. For the high records you will get prizes, which are Jem cups.

Controls:

-Browser Edition - arrow keys

-Android Edition - left right buttons
